trans-unit.source: Specifies the order of XML Digital Signature and XML Encryption operations when both are performed on the same document.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a ordem das operações de Assinatura Digital XML e Criptografia XML quando ambas são executadas no mesmo documento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> class provides a transform that determines the order of XML Digital Signature and XML Encryption operations when both are performed on the same document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> classe fornece uma transformação que determina a ordem das operações de Assinatura Digital XML e criptografia XML quando ambos são executadas no mesmo documento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> class whenever you need to perform XML encryption and apply an XML digital signature to the same XML document.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> classe sempre que você precisa executar a criptografia de XML e aplicar uma assinatura digital XML no mesmo documento XML.

trans-unit.source: You must pass an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.EncryptedXml%2A> property that contains the necessary key information to decrypt the document.
trans-unit.target: Você deve passar um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> o objeto para o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.EncryptedXml%2A> propriedade que contém as informações de chave necessárias para descriptografar o documento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" />.

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to exclude from processing
trans-unit.target: Um URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) a ser excluído do processo

trans-unit.source: Adds a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to exclude from processing.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) a ser excluído do processo.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="uri" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="uri" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml" /> object that contains information about the keys necessary to decrypt an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml" /> que contém informações sobre as chaves necessárias para descriptografar um documento XML.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml" /> object that contains information about the keys necessary to decrypt an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml" /> objeto que contém informações sobre as chaves necessárias para descriptografar um documento XML.

trans-unit.source: You must pass an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.EncryptedXml%2A> property that contains the necessary key information to decrypt the document.
trans-unit.target: Você deve passar um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> o objeto para o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.EncryptedXml%2A> propriedade que contém as informações de chave necessárias para descriptografar o documento.

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma representação XML dos parâmetros de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> adequados para serem incluídos como subelementos de um elemento <see langword="<Transform>" /> XMLDSIG.

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object in an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de nós XML que representa o conteúdo específico da transformação necessário para descrever o objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> atual em um elemento <see langword="<Transform>" /> XMLDSIG.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A decryption key could not be found.
trans-unit.target: Não foi possível encontrar uma chave de descriptografia.

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de saída a ser retornada.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> is the only valid type for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> é o único tipo válido para esse parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter is not an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="type" /> não é um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz de tipos que são entradas válidas para o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de tipos de entrada válidas para o atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> objeto; você pode passar apenas os objetos de um desses tipos para o <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> método atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.InputTypes%2A> property must contain at least one element because every <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> object must accept at least one type as valid input.
trans-unit.target: A matriz retornada pelo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.InputTypes%2A> propriedade deve conter pelo menos um elemento porque cada <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> objeto deve aceitar a pelo menos um tipo como uma entrada válida.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> object typically accepts one or more of the following types as input: <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> objeto normalmente aceita um ou mais dos seguintes tipos como entrada: <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, ou <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object with an ID attribute to compare with <c>idValue</c>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> com um atributo de ID para comparar com <c>idValue</c>.

trans-unit.source: The value to compare with the ID attribute of <c>inputElement</c>.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser comparado com o atributo da ID de <c>inputElement</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the ID attribute of an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object matches a specified value.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o atributo de ID de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> corresponde a um valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the ID attribute of the <paramref name="inputElement" /> parameter matches the <paramref name="idValue" /> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o atributo da ID do parâmetro <paramref name="inputElement" /> corresponder ao parâmetro <paramref name="idValue" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object that specifies transform-specific content for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> que especifica o conteúdo específico da transformação do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object as transform-specific content of a <see langword="<Transform>" /> element and configures the internal state of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object to match the <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Analisa o objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> especificado como conteúdo específico da transformação de um elemento <see langword="<Transform>" /> e configura o estado interno do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> atual para corresponder ao elemento <see langword="<Transform>" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to process subelements of a `<Transform>` element.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para processar os subelementos de um `<Transform>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="nodeList" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="nodeList" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) value of an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object in <paramref name="nodeList" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: O valor do URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> em <paramref name="nodeList" /> não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The length of the URI value of an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object in <paramref name="nodeList" /> is 0.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento do valor do URI de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> em <paramref name="nodeList" /> é 0.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The first character of the URI value of an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object in <paramref name="nodeList" /> is not '#'.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro caractere do valor do URI de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> em <paramref name="nodeList" /> não é “#”.

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A entrada a ser carregada no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, loads the specified input into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, carrega a entrada especificada no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de objeto de entrada deve ser um dos tipos de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.InputTypes%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="obj" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="obj" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz de tipos que são possíveis saídas provenientes de métodos <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.GetOutput" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de tipos de saída válido para o atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> objeto; somente os objetos de um desses tipos são retornados do <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.GetOutput" /> métodos do atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.OutputTypes%2A> property must contain at least one element because every transform must generate at least one type as output.
trans-unit.target: A matriz retornada pelo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.OutputTypes%2A> propriedade deve conter pelo menos um elemento porque cada transformação deve gerar pelo menos um tipo como saída.
